reviewText: This was a very good purchase.  Beautiful setting, wonderful hymns, and nearly all of the "old timers' joining in on the singing.  It was all I hoped for.
summary: Hymns With Bill & Gloria Gaither and thier Homecoming Friends

reviewText: This has become one of my favorite DVD's Only problem I have is its a two part show, they have the second part called something in the Church Hill if Im not mistaken. In anycase great Hymns ans singing from top to bottom I enjoyed it alot.

reviewText: I love, love, love this DVD.  The songs will touch your heart and make you feel good.  I love the whole Gaither Homecoming DVD's and I am going to purchase more.
summary: Hymns with Bill and Gloria Gaither

reviewText: this was a joy to watch, seeing some of the artists that have passed, i greately enjoyed this dvd, but then again i enjoy watching all of the gaither stuff.

reviewText: Wonderful and inspiring hymns in the famous and legendary Bill Gaither way.  We really enjoyed watching the Homecoming Friends and Bill and Gloria interacting.  Music is lovely.
